metadata.title: CVE-2019-12481 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in GPAC 0.7.1. There is a NULL pointer dereferencein the function GetESD at isomedia/track.c in libgpac.a, as demonstrated byMP4Box.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
